dsOverview.title: Scripps Pier and West Coast Seawater Temperature and Salinity Observations

summary.p: Twenty-nine time series data files with temperature and salinity recorded at approx. 14 locations along the west coast of the U.S.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: SCRIPPS/IOD/CDIP > Coastal Data Information Program, Integrative Oceanography Division, Scripps Institution of Oceanography

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Oceans > Ocean Temperature > Sea Surface Temperature
